description.zh-cn: 位于西南欧伊比利亚半岛上的一个共和制国家。
description.en: A republic located on the Iberian Peninsula in Southwestern Europe.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙共和国的首都及最大城市。
description.en: The capital and largest city of the Portuguese Republic.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The head of state of the Portuguese Republic.

description.zh-cn: 现任葡萄牙总统。
description.en: The current President of Portugal.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙共和国的政府首脑职位。
description.en: The head of government of the Portuguese Republic.

description.zh-cn: 现任葡萄牙总理。
description.en: The current Prime Minister of Portugal.

description.zh-cn: 一场推翻了葡萄牙君主制并建立第一共和国的革命。
description.en: A revolution that overthrew the Portuguese monarchy and established the First Republic.

description.zh-cn: 1139年至1910年间存在于伊比利亚半岛西部的君主制国家。
description.en: A monarchy on the western Iberian Peninsula that existed from 1139 to 1910.

description.zh-cn: 1974年在葡萄牙发生的一场军事政变，导致了“新国家”法西斯政权的倒台和葡萄牙的民主化。
description.en: A military coup in Portugal in 1974 which led to the fall of the Estado Novo authoritarian regime and the restoration of democracy.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1974年间统治葡萄牙的社团主义独裁政权。
description.en: The corporatist authoritarian regime that ruled Portugal from 1933 to 1974.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟的前身。
description.en: The predecessor to the European Union.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲和北美国家为实现防御合作而建立的国际组织。
description.en: An international organization established by European and North American countries for defense cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 以葡萄牙语为官方语言的国家的政府间国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization of countries where Portuguese is an official language.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙共和国将澳门主权移交给中华人民共和国的事件。
description.en: The event where the Portuguese Republic transferred the sovereignty of Macau to the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 南美洲国家，曾是葡萄牙最大的殖民地。
description.en: A country in South America, formerly Portugal's largest colony.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙政治家，曾长期担任总理和独裁者，是“新国家”政权的建立者和领导者。
description.en: A Portuguese statesman who served as Prime Minister and dictator for many years, founding and leading the 'Estado Novo' regime.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙军事领导人和政治家，1926年军事政变后上台，后成为葡萄牙总统。
description.en: A Portuguese military leader and politician who came to power after the 1926 coup and later became President of Portugal.

description.zh-cn: 一场导致葡萄牙第一共和国终结和军事独裁开始的军事政变。
description.en: A military coup that ended the Portuguese First Republic and initiated a military dictatorship.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙政治家，曾任总理和总统，是葡萄牙民主化的关键人物。
description.en: A Portuguese politician who served as Prime Minister and President, a key figure in Portugal's transition to democracy.

nodes.id: 克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多

zh-cn: 克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙职业足球运动员，被认为是历史上最伟大的足球运动员之一。
description.en: A Portuguese professional footballer, widely regarded as one of the greatest players of all time.

description.zh-cn: 代表葡萄牙参加国际足球比赛的国家队。
description.en: The national team that represents Portugal in international football competitions.

description.zh-cn: 2016年举行的欧洲国家级足球赛事。
description.en: The European national football championship held in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 马塞洛·雷贝洛·德索萨于2016年就任葡萄牙总统。
description.en: Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa took office as President of Portugal in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 路易斯·蒙特内格罗是现任葡萄牙总理。
description.en: Luís Montenegro is the current Prime Minister of Portugal.

description.zh-cn: 1910年10月5日革命推翻了君主制，建立了葡萄牙共和国。
description.en: The 5 October 1910 revolution overthrew the monarchy and established the Portuguese Republic.

description.zh-cn: 1910年10月5日革命推翻了葡萄牙王国。
description.en: The 5 October 1910 revolution overthrew the Kingdom of Portugal.

description.zh-cn: 康乃馨革命推翻了极右政权，开启了葡萄牙的民主化进程。
description.en: The Carnation Revolution overthrew the far-right regime and began the process of democratization in Portugal.

description.zh-cn: 康乃馨革命推翻了持续42年的“新国家”极右政权。
description.en: The Carnation Revolution overthrew the 42-year-long 'Estado Novo' far-right regime.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙于1986年1月1日加入欧洲共同体。
description.en: Portugal joined the European Communities on January 1, 1986.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙是北大西洋公约组织的创始成员国之一。
description.en: Portugal is one of the founding members of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙是葡萄牙语国家共同体的创始成员国之一。
description.en: Portugal is one of the founding members of the Community of Portuguese Language Countries.

description.zh-cn: 澳门主权移交中华人民共和国，结束了葡萄牙作为殖民国家的历史。
description.en: The handover of Macau's sovereignty to the People's Republic of China ended Portugal's history as a colonial power.

description.zh-cn: 通过澳门回归，中华人民共和国恢复对澳门行使主权。
description.en: Through the handover of Macau, the People's Republic of China resumed the exercise of sovereignty over Macau.

description.zh-cn: 1822年，随着最大殖民地巴西的独立，葡萄牙的国势逐渐衰落。
description.en: In 1822, with the independence of its largest colony, Brazil, Portugal's national power gradually declined.

description.zh-cn: 1926年5月的军事政变后，卡尔莫纳元帅上台。
description.en: After the military coup in May 1926, Marshal Carmona came to power.

description.zh-cn: 财政部长安东尼奥·萨拉查于1930年就任总理，后成为独裁者，建立了“新国家”政权。
description.en: Minister of Finance António de Oliveira Salazar became Prime Minister in 1930 and later a dictator, establishing the 'Estado Novo' regime.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，马里奥·苏亚雷斯当选为60年来第一位文人总统。
description.en: In 1986, Mário Soares was elected as the first civilian president in 60 years.

relationships.source: 克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多

description.zh-cn: 克里斯蒂亚诺·罗纳尔多是葡萄牙国家足球队的队长和杰出球员。
description.en: Cristiano Ronaldo is the captain and a prominent player for the Portugal national football team.

description.zh-cn: 葡萄牙国家足球队在2016年欧洲足球锦标赛中夺得冠军。
description.en: The Portugal national football team won the championship at UEFA Euro 2016.
